releases.name: MultiRconAPI v2.0.1
releases.description:
Minor bug fixes
- init instance in new thread
- fix errors when use server port in config
- add test scripts
- ...

releases.name: MultiRconAPI v2.0.0
releases.description:
**Config format has changed, please be aware!**
**配置文件格式发生了变化, 请注意!**

- Standalone server data file, so you can edit one place and changes everything
- 独立的服务器数据文件, 从而可以一处编辑, 处处有效

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/FAS-Server/MultiRconAPI/compare/1.2.0...v2.0.0
